敢.definition: to dare; daring; (polite) may I venture

敢不從命.definition: to not dare to disobey an order (idiom)

敢作敢為.definition: (idiom) to stop at nothing; to dare to do anything

敢作敢當.definition: variant of 敢做敢當|敢做敢当[gan3 zuo4 gan3 dang1]

敢做敢當.definition: daring to act and courageous enough to take responsibility for it; a true man has the courage to accept the consequences of his actions; the buck stops here

敢怒而不敢言.pinyin: gan3 nu4 er2 bu4 gan3 yan2
敢怒而不敢言.definition: angry, but not daring to speak out (idiom); obliged to remain silent about one's resentment; unable to voice objections

敢情.definition: actually; as it turns out; indeed; of course

敢於.definition: to have the courage to do sth; to dare to; bold in

敢為人先.definition: to dare to be first; to pioneer (idiom)
